scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd apps/backend && go mod download && go mod tidy
scripts.setup:db: cd infrastructure/docker && docker-compose up -d db && cd ../../apps/backend && go run cmd/migrate/main.go
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd apps/frontend && npm install" "cd apps/backend && go mod download"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:db" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
